pageContext.claim: “He should be FIRED by Concast. If done by a Republican, would be ‘prosecuted’. @AjitPaiFCC [quoting a tweet about Chuck Todd]”
pageContext.analysis: NBC issued a correction and acknowledged that Todd, the host of "Meet the Press," misquoted remarks from Attorney General William Barr. Trump as usual goes way overboard in calling for Todd's firing and suggestively tagging the chairman of the Federal Communications Commission in his tweet.
